easy: Nick, standing in the door of the kitchen,
had a good view of the upper bunk when his father,
lamp in one hand, tipped the Indian’s head back.
In my younger and more vulnerable years
my father gave me some advice
that I’ve been turning over in my head ever since.
I like to think of the tree itself:
first the close dry sensation of being wood;
then the grinding of the storm.

moderate: Nell sits on the edge of the dock,
She and splinters have a long history.
It was the best of times,
it was the worst of times,
it was the age of wisdom,
it was the age of foolishness.
Only two Americans were staying at the hotel;
they did not know any of the people they passed
on the stairs on their way to and from their room.
Their room was on the second floor facing the sea.

hard: Last year, about a month into the pandemic,
I’d first read it as a teenager,
and had reread it a handful of times by my twenties.
He did extraordinarily well in the war:
He was a captain before he went to the front,
he got his majority and the command
We began with some simple verbs:
the video cameras didn’t inhibit him at all.
